August: Khii Zhrii or Khii Zhrįį, also Di'lii
Creator: Nan Gwiłtsąįį
January: Tr'ookit Shree Nan, “also” Ahtr'aii Shree Choo, “also” Ch'anjaa
July: łuk Choo Zhrii “or” łuk Choo Zhrįį “or” Vanan Neets'an Ch'aazhii
Merlin: dzii choo “or” dzii choh “or” tsii choo “or” chii choo;  ahch'ii (Ritt)
Monday: Drin Tł'ęę “also” Drin Ch'ihłak, “also” Drin Ts'an Ch'ihłak
Saturday: Drin Ts'a', “also” Drin Nik'iitik “or” Drin Ts'an Nik'iitik
Sunday: Drin Zhit, “also” Neegwaazhii Drin “or” Neeraazhii Drin
Thanksgiving: hąį' gwintł'an deerii'aii drin “or” khąį' gwintł'eegwada'aii
Thursday: Drin Dǫǫ, “also” Drin Ts'an Drin Dǫǫ
Tuesday: Drin Neekwąįį, “also” Drin Ts'an Drin Neekwąįį
Wednesday: Drin Ts'an Drin Tik “also” Drin Tik
accident: He had an accident (and got hurt)
actually: Shoh t'inchy'aa yuunyąą akhai' gaa dinjik t'inchy'aa.
He thought it was a bear but actually it was a moose.
adept: she is adept (used only of women and girls)
he is adept (used only of men and boys)
admonish: yideegwaah'ee, also gineey hdaii or gineeyahndaii
ago: also see past: neegwadadhat ch'ihlak dai' or neegwadadhat ch'ihlak gweedhaa gwanaa
agree: yaa lii naadhan, also yik'it t'iindhan
allow: she doesn't allow him to do it
amazed: he is amazed (it's too much for him)
any: any of them, any part of it
around (an area): way out around him or her
around (its edge, rim): a cup, a bowl, or a drum)
arrange: she is arranging it, getting it ready
he is arranging them, putting them in order
arrive: he arrived in a boat (by paddling)
ascend: he is ascending, rising up in the air
ask: she is asking him to accompany her
she asked him to accompany her
she is asking him to come, summoning him
she asked him to come, summoned him
at: at that time: see then at
attention: she is paying attention to him
away (from the river): far away from the river, far inland
blind, blind man: dinjii dee ehdan “or” dinjii ndee ehdan “or” vindee-kwaa
bumblebee, bees: ch'ęędzit ghoo, “or” ch'ineedzit ghoo, “or” ch'eedzit ghoo
label: k'eiich'ii kak gahochaa
law (going by the writings of the countr: jii nan kak tr'adąątł'oo vinjik gweedhaa
only: zhrii “or” zhrįį, “also” rii “or” rįį “or” zhrį'or rį'
owner: dinjii gwats'a' k'eegwaadhat, “also” dinjii vats'an ch'inlįį
pregnant, a pregnant woman: tr'injaa vizhit tr'iinin “or” tr'iinin haa ahaa
rainbow, circular rainbow around the sun: shree neech'įįlt'aii “or” shree neech'ilt'aii, “also” zhee vęę neech'ąąkhyuu
red sun glasses to prevent snowblindness: dachan neeghin k'ik “or” dachan neezhin ch'ik
repeat, she repeated it: chan akǫǫ dinyaa “or” chan gwik'it teenich'igijii
restaurant: ch'ara'aa zheh “or” ch'a'ah zhee “or” ch'a'aa zheh
snowy owl: vatsaii vee “or” vatthąįį vee “or” vatsąįį vęę “or” vatthąįį vęę
spruce cone: ts'ivii daadzal “or” ts'iivii daadzal “or” ts'iivii deedzal
table: vakaa'aa “or” vakaii'aa, “also” vakak ch'ara'aa “or” vakak ch'ii'aa
universe: nan kak zhee kak haa datthak
wind, south wind, Chinook wind: yeenihjyaa ahtr'aii dhaa “or” yeenihnjyaa ahtr'aii dhaa
